items.q: Making friends in a new country is not easy, but it is possible if you use some simple strategies. ____________________
Maintaining a healthy lifestyle throughout your life relies upon the three key elements of regular exercise, proper diet, and a positive outlook. ____________________
Budgeting your money is a simple process that will enable you to save and spend your money wisely. ____________________
To maintain a healthy lifestyle throughout your lifetime, you need to follow a few simple steps. ____________________

By keeping a log of your regular purchases and tracking all of your expenses, you can create an up-to-date budget that will help you determine how to both save and spend your money. ____________________
Making an effort to go out in public to meet new people and studying local current events are two simple strategies that can help you make friends in a new country. ____________________
We water our garden on a daily ____________________ (basis / dose).
It ____________________ (has / makes) sense that it will take a few months to build the new gym.
Exercise, in conjunction ____________________ (by / with) a low-fat diet, has helped many people lose weight.
Some people ____________________ (claim / entail) that the water in the pool is cold, but I think it's the perfect temperature.
A policeman with the same credentials ____________________ (as / with) you just stopped by to speak with me.
If you want to get those pots clean, you'll have to use some elbow ____________________ (grease / detergent).
It is the policy of the school not to discriminate ____________________ (for / against) anyone on the basis of race, creed, color, or gender.
The decision to not give raises this year was not my idea. That decision was made by ____________________ (glamorous / higher) management.
She prefers to shop at Sunset Foods because they always have a ____________________ (fat / wide) variety of fresh fruits.
If I have several things to do, I always like to ____________________ (tackle / wrinkle) the most difficult task first.

Climate change due to global warming has impacted the habitats of many animals and has resulted in an increase in the number of endangered species. a. cause-effect b. narrative c. comparison d. argumentative
Mandatory school uniforms should be the required dress code for all public school students in this country. a. cause-effect b. narrative c. comparison d. argumentative
From beginning to end, Jason's time living abroad was full of excitement. a. cause-effect b. narrative c. comparison d. argumentative
Although they are both American authors, there are many differences between the writing styles of Mark Twain and James Fenimore Cooper. a. cause-effect b. narrative c. comparison d. argumentative
When drivers disregard safe driving practices, the outcome can include car accidents, road rage, and reckless driving. a. cause-effect b. narrative c. comparison d. argumentative
Children's cartoons often promote violence towards others, and children under the age of 8 should not be allowed to watch them. a. cause-effect b. narrative c. comparison d. argumentative
Although they look similar in appearance, the panther and the lion are very different animals. a. cause-effect b. narrative c. comparison d. argumentative

Despite movie ratings and warnings, young children are still exposed to violent images on television shows, in movies, and in video games. Without a doubt, parents should keep a close watch on the types of media that their children are watching. a. suggestion b. opinion c. prediction

People have a deep love for their pets, and they will continue to purchase clothing, food, medicines, and other products that promise to help make their pet's lives happier and more comfortable. a. suggestion b. opinion c. prediction

In conclusion, it is clear that many school-aged children are not getting enough instruction in the subjects of reading and math, and this lack of instruction will hinder their job performance later in life. a. suggestion b. opinion c. prediction
Bullying can be eliminated from the classroom if teachers, students, and parents participate in an open dialog about the subject. a. suggestion b. opinion c. prediction

Because of the time commitment required and the amount of practice needed, students who play team sports should earn extra credit for the time they spend practicing or playing. a. suggestion b. opinion c. prediction
Remember, shortly after noticing the sound of a loud muffler, it won't be long before other parts of your automobile need repair. a. suggestion b. opinion c. prediction
In order to stop vandalism to the city parks and playgrounds, all members of the law enforcement community should regularly patrol these areas. a. suggestion b. opinion c. prediction
cause-effect
narrative
comparison
argumentative
an unpleasant task
the cost of going to a school
hesitant
not enough
a disadvantage, something that can cause a problem
food items, especially vegetables
having few people and lots of land
habit
suspicious, unwilling
common

Title: I. Introduction (Paragraph 1) A. Hook: B. Connecting information: C. Thesis statement: II. Body A. Paragraph 2 1. Topic sentence: Because culture shock can cause feelings of depression, sadness, and loneliness, it is important to get involved in community organizations that will allow you to meet new people. 2. Supporting ideas: III. Body A. Paragraph 3 1. Topic sentence: 2. Supporting ideas: It is important to maintain confidence in yourself and follow your ambitions. You should establish simple goals and regularly evaluate your progress. You should use relaxation and mediation techniques to help get you through stressful periods. IV. Body A. Paragraph 4 1. Topic sentence: The aches, pains, allergies, and other physical illnesses that culture shock can cause can be remedied by eating a nutritional diet and including physical activity in your normal routine. 2. Supporting ideas: V. Conclusion (Paragraph 5) A. Restatement of thesis:
Have you ever been kept awake most of the night by police sirens, blaring car alarms, and noisy neighbors?
Urban areas have lots of cultural attractions.
In rural areas, the beauty of nature is all around you and the cold, grey, steel buildings of the city are left behind.
After reading this essay, there will be no doubt that living in a rural area will make your life more serene and peaceful.
A small apartment is better than a large farm.
Media outlets report extensively on domestic affairs while many serious foreign affairs are not widely discussed.

With a constant stream of reliable information coming in from all over the world, media outlets should be able to thoroughly explain foreign affairs that often go unreported and unknown to many citizens of this country.
What happens when a family member goes to prison and the rest of the family is left to build a life without them?
This documentary is an interesting film that looks at the difficult lives of prisoners and their families.
Elizabeth was not even playing with her teddy bear, but as soon as Ellen tried to grab it, Elizabeth ran toward her and yelled, "Mine!"
Children need discipline and guidance to help them learn how to share their belongings.
A fear of heights can stem from a variety of sources.
My heart was racing and my palms were sweaty as I looked down to the ground, which was hundreds of feet below.
